short_description_localized.en: We're proud to extend a special value package to our men and women in the active and reserve U.S. Armed Forces. With nightly rates starting from $109, plus tax, you'll enjoy one-bedroom suite accommodations, a $10 nightly food and beverage credit and a 1pm late check-out.  Plus, our daily signature hot breakfast buffet and parking are always FREE!  Rate does not include the Hotel Fee of $16.95 per night, plus tax.

description_localized.en:
We're proud to extend a special value package to our men and women in the active and reserve U.S. Armed Forces. With nightly rates starting from $109, plus tax, you'll enjoy one-bedroom suite accommodations, a $10 nightly food and beverage credit and a 1pm late check-out.  Plus, our daily signature hot breakfast buffet and parking are always FREE!

Rate does not include the Hotel Fee of $16.95 per night, plus tax.
